title: smart data recovery 3.9 portable from freshwap
description:
smart data recovery 3.9 portable form freshwap

info: Smart Data Recovery is a data recovery tool for Windows operating system that supports the FAT and NTFS file systems.
Smart Data Recovery is an effective and powerful, easy-to-use software program that enables the recovery of lost data.
Smart Data Recovery is compatible with almost all kinds of data storage ? from computer hard drives to digital cameras. It also supports flash drives, USB drives, floppy disks, memory sticks, PC cards, multimedia cards, and secure digital cards. Smart Data Recovery is able to restore all sorts of files, including electronic documents and pictures. It restores files from FAT32 and NTFS hard drives, has really simple interface and is compatible with Windows operations systems. Our aim is to prevent information loss, and prevent you from wasting your time and money. For different reasons, important documents and user files are sometimes lost. Without a recovery tool for documents and files, this may become a huge problem (one that leads to considerable inconveniences, and requires expensive solutions).
